title: Researcher calls on the scientific community to defend individuals with disabilities

title_detail.value: Researcher calls on the scientific community to defend individuals with disabilities

summary: The potential repeal of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) threatens to eliminate critical mental and behavioral health services for people living with autism and other disabilities.

summary_detail.value: The potential repeal of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) threatens to eliminate critical mental and behavioral health services for people living with autism and other disabilities.
